channel.title: CVE Feed for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for IBM -- Rational Quality Manager

item.title: CVE-2017-1729|2024-09-16T16:27:30.089Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 134909.

item.title: CVE-2018-1605|2024-09-16T16:27:41.275Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager (RQM) 5.0 through 5.02 and 6.0 through 6.0.6 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 143795.

item.title: CVE-2017-1314|2024-09-16T16:17:48.626Z -- ibm -- rational%20quality%20manager
item.description: IBM Rational Quality Manager and IBM Rational Collaborative Lifecycle Management 5.0 through 5.0.2 and 6.0 through 6.0.5 are vulnerable to cross-site scripting. This vulnerability allows users to embed arbitrary JavaScript code in the Web UI thus altering the intended functionality potentially leading to credentials disclosure within a trusted session. IBM X-Force ID: 125725.
